item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Hercules Mulligan's on Thayer Street on College Hill!

So, this is one of the very newest additions (as of January 2012) to the Thayer Street restaurant and pub scene. Its an Irish bar with an interesting American history twist: http://herculesmulligans.com/Hercules.html The menu looks interesting and supposedly the beer selection is pretty good. So let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Jerry is hosting this one! Please look at his picture!!!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Hercules Mulligan's!
